Sentencas: Sealing technology is currently considered a top-priority task for planar solid oxide fuel-cell stack development.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Compressive mica seals are among the major candidates for sealing materials due to their thermal, chemical, and electrical properties.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, a comprehensive study of mica seals is presented.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two natural micas, muscovite and phlogopite, were investigated in either a monolithic single-crystal sheet form or a paper form composed of discrete mica flakes.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A hybrid mica seal, developed after identification of the major leak paths in compressive mica seals, demonstrated leak rates that were hundreds to thousands times lower than leak rates for conventional mica seals.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The hybrid mica seals were further modified by infiltration with wetting materials; these infiltrated micas showed excellent thermal cycle stability with very low leak rates (10(-3) sccm/cm).
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The micas were also subjected to studies to evaluate thermal stability in a reducing environment as well as the effect of compressive stresses on leak rates.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, long-term open circuit voltage measurements versus thermal cycling showed constant voltages over 1,000 cycles.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The comprehensive study clearly demonstrated the potential of compressive mica seals as sealing candidates for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Compressive mica seals for solid oxide fuel cells
